name: mikroe.click.press
short_description: PRESS Click is a compact add-on board that contains a board-mount pressure sensor. This board features the ILPS28QSW, an absolute digital output barometer from STMicroelectronics. It is a dual full-scale sensor with a measuring range of 260 up to 4060hPa. In addition, it comes with a Qvar detection ability, which is an electric charge variation detection and is available on two pins.
